title: How can I find ICCID if it does not appear in SIM status?
content:
SIM card is cut down from a micro SIM, so the full SIM number isn't visible on the card.  Apparently the ICCID is supposed to be in SIM status under About, but when i look there and scroll down it's not there. There's not even an ICCID: unknown listing.

SIM is from Tracfone, I need this info to port to another carrier
